org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor.Sensor

    org.numenta.nupic.network

      Layer<T> Layer.add(Sensor sensor)

    • Uses of Sensor in org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor

      Classes in org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor that implement Sensor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FileSensor
      Default implementation of a Sensor for inputting data from a file.
      class  HTMSensor<T>
      Decorator for Sensor types adding HTM specific functionality to sensors and streams.
      class  ObservableSensor<T>
      Wraps an rx.Observable or Publisher event emitter which can be used to input CSV strings into a given Layer of a Region and Network by either manually calling Publisher.onNext(String) or by connecting an Observable to an existing chain of Observables (operations/transformations) which eventually yield an appropriate CSV String input.
      class  URISensor
      Sensor which creates its source stream from a URI Instances of this class should be obtained via the factory URISensor.create(SensorParams) method.
      Fields in org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor declared as Sensor 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Creates and returns the Sensor subtype indicated by the method reference passed in for the SensorFactory FunctionalInterface argument.

      Factory method to allow creation through the SensorFactory in the create(SensorFactory, SensorParams) method of the parent Sensor class.
